title: Where the Ivy Grows
description: It's time to disobey...When Sophia first meets Hollywood actor and Ivy College teacher, Marc Blackwell, she never dreams they’ll share a forbidden, obsessive relationship.Now, dawn is breaking and they’ve decided to tell the world of their affair.But as paparazzi hound Sophia’s every move, Marc steps up his control – dominating Sophia in every way possible, and drawing her into his dark world of intensity and passion.Soon, Sophia is led into Marc’s troubled past, and shown the shadowy secrets that torment him.However, Marc’s desire to discipline Sophia awakens her deepest fears, and she realises it’s time to disobey.
author: S.K. Quinn
